title: SS.PT.393
prompt: Based on the excerpts, which idea is held in common by both speakers?
description: World leaders acknowledged the 60th anniversary of the liberation of the Nazi concentration camp Auschwitz where over a million people, most of them Jews, were killed by the German government during World War II, by speaking about the event. Below are excerpts from two speeches.
feedback: Ariel Sharon says that Israel has learned a lesson, and that the Jewish nation must protect Jews. Gerhard Schroder says that the government must protect itself against people who refuse to learn from the past.Both speakers imply that modern countries should learn from the events of the past.
